title: a sans serif that goes with wavy logo
content:
Hello,

I'm currently making a logo for a company that sells hearing aids.

The symbol is going to be pretty wavy and soft. I'm trying to find a sans serif that would fit. If it had true italics that would be a plus but not necessary.

thanks  
peter
author: kattttor

comments.content:
A light weight of Gill might look nice. Or you can try Gotham Rounded. It would help to see the logo.

- Lex

oh, The name is Danalink.

just in case anyone knows a font that has a nice D, a or k.
